price: 他说：“我的宗族啊！我一点也不愚蠢，但我是众世界的养主派遣的使者。
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
